text.name: Fathom Trawl
text.text: When this unit comes into play, you may return an alteration spell from your discard to your hand.

text.name: Inheritance 1
text.text: When this unit is destroyed, you may place 1 status token on a target unit.
Remove up to 3 wound tokens and 1 exhaustion token from among Phoenixborn your opponents control. Then remove an equivalent number of tokens (by type) from your Phoenixborn.
As an additional cost to cast this spell, remove up to four status tokens from among units you control.
Remove 1 + X wound tokens from among units you control, where X is the number of of status tokens you removed to cast this spell.
This unit now has the following abilities:

text.name: Battle Advantage
text.text: When this unit is in battle, it deals its damage before other units without Battle Advantage deal their damage.

text.name: Deathstrike
text.text: When this unit deals 1 or more damage to a unit it is attacking or countering, destroy that unit.

text.name: Biding Time
text.text: While this unit has 1 or more exhaustion tokens on it, it cannot be affected by opponents' spells, abilities, or dice powers, and cannot be chosen as the target of an attack action.
When one or more exhaustion tokens are removed from this Phoenixborn, place 1 wound token on this Phoenixborn.
At the end of the round, move 1 die from your active pool to your exhausted pool.
Place a [[Deepwater Hammerhead]] conjuration onto the battlefield.
Discard the top 2 cards of your draw pile. If you do, place a [[Riptide Siren]] conjuration onto your battlefield.

text.name: Focus 1
text.text: Discard 1 fewer card from the top of your draw pile.

text.name: Focus 2
text.text: You may place 1 status token on a Riptide Siren you control.

When a unit would deal damage by attacking or countering, you may spend 1 [[natural:class]] and place 1 exhaustion token on this card to reduce a target unit's attack value by 1 until the end of the turn.

text.name: Focus 1
text.text: You may reduce that unit's attack value by an additional 1.

text.name: Focus 2
text.text: Then, you may reduce that unit's attack value by an additional 1.
Deal 2 damage to each unit without any status tokens on them.

text.name: Trial by Fire
text.text: Choose a target unexhausted unit you control and a target unexhausted unit an opponent controls. Those units deal damage to each other equal to their attack value. If only one of those units remains in play afterward, place 1 status token on it.

text.name: Consume
text.text: Whenever an opponent's unit is destroyed as a result of a spell, attack, counter, ability, or dice power you control, place 1 status token on this unit. If the destroyed unit was an ally, remove it from the game.

text.name: Blood in the Water
text.text: Whenever a conjuration would leave play, you may remove 3 status tokens from this card. If you do, until the end of the turn whenever a conjuration would be removed from the game, discard it instead.

text.name: Entrancing Melody
text.text: Remove 1 status token from this unit. If you do, choose a card in a target discard pile. Either shuffle that card into its owner's draw pile, or remove it from the game.

text.name: Create Elixir
text.text: Place a die from your active pool onto this card on a class side.

text.name: Consume Elixir
text.text: You may exhaust dice on this card as if they were in your active pool when paying costs of cards in your hand or the activation costs of ready spells.
You may play this spell when a unit would be destroyed or removed from the game.
Prevent that destruction or removal. If the unit is an ally you control, place it in your hand. Otherwise, discard that unit and draw 1 card.
When this spell comes into play, re-roll up to 1 die in your exhausted pool and place it into your active pool.

When an ally would be placed in a player's discard pile from the battlefield, you may place 1 exhaustion token on this spell. If you do, place that ally under your Phoenixborn face down instead of placing it in its owner's discard pile.

text.name: One with Nothing
text.text: Place 1 wound token on a target unit and 1 wound token on a target Phoenixborn. Then, destroy this unit.

text.name: Entombed
text.text: This unit cannot be placed in your hand from a discard pile through abilities or dice powers.

text.name: Deathstrike
text.text: When this unit deals 1 or more damage to a unit it is attacking or countering, destroy that unit.

text.name: Alert
text.text: Do not place an exhaustion token on this unit as a result of it countering.

You may play this spell when an opponent's spell, ability, or dice power targets a unit you control or would become attached to it. If you do, draw 1 card, then select 1 die in your exhausted pool, re-roll it, and place it in your active pool.
Destroy the targeted unit and cancel all remaining effects of that spell, ability, or dice power.

text.name: Fateful Arrival
text.text: When this unit leaves play, search your draw pile for an ally card with a name other than Soul Augur, reveal it, and place it in your hand. Shuffle your draw pile.

Reveal any number of ally cards from your hand and face down under your Phoenixborn. Place a [[Necromantic Abomination]] conjuration onto the battlefield, and place all revealed ally cards face down underneath that unit.

text.name: Focus 1
text.text: You may place 1 additional ally from your discard pile face down underneath that [[Necromantic Abomination]].

text.name: Focus 2
text.text: Move any number of face down ally cards from under a [[Necromantic Abomination]] you control to another [[Necromantic Abomination]] you control.
Remove an unexhausted ally you control from play. If you do, place a [[Reaper Mount]] conjuration onto your battlefield and place that ally face down under that unit.

When a unit with no inexhaustible abilities would be destroyed, you may spend 1 [[ceremonial:class]], 1 [[basic]], and place 1 exhaustion token on this card. If you do, remove all tokens, attached cards, and dice from that unit. Then, instead of destroying it, place it on your battlefield with an [[Unnatural]] conjured alteration spell attached to it.

text.name: Focus 2
text.text: You may choose not to attach an [[Unnatural]] conjured alteration spell to that unit.
Discard this alteration at the beginning of your turn.
This unit now has the following ability:

text.name: Dauntless
text.text: If this unit recevies damage in battle, remove 1 exhaustion token from this unit at the end of that battle.
This unit is considered to have no abilities.
If this alteration would become unattached from this unit, discard this card and destroy the attached unit instead.

text.name: Terrifying 1
text.text: This unit cannot be blocked or guarded against by units with an attack value of 1 or less.

text.name: Extra Limbs
text.text: For each face down card under this unit, add 1 to this unit's attack and life values.

text.name: Slough
text.text: When this unit would receive damage, you may discard a face down card underneath this unit to prevent that damage.

text.name: Gather Specimens
text.text: At the end of the prepare phase, you may place 1 ally from any discard pile face down under this card.

text.name: Extract Essence
text.text: Discard 1 face down card from this card. If that card is an ally, attach an [[Imbued Vigor]] conjured alteration spell to a target unit.

text.name: Stalk
text.text: This unit cannot be guarded against.

text.name: Unsummon
text.text: Discard this unit.

text.name: Dismount Rider
text.text: After this unit leaves play, choose a face down ally that was under this unit and dismount that ally.
